original_text: These were the renowned of the congregation, princes of the tribes of their fathers, heads of thousands in Israel.
korean_text: 그들은 회중에서 부름을 받은 자요 그 조상 지파의 지휘관으로서 이스라엘 종족들의 우두머리라

sentences.original_text: These were the renowned of the congregation
princes of the tribes of their fathers
